overview.en: DCC (Decentralized Contract Chain), based on Ethereum and IPFS, serves as a decentralized electronic contract signing platform. Any individual or enterprise can complete the contract signing quickly, conveniently and safely without the intervention of a third party with DCC.
overview.zh: DCC（Decentralized contract chain）是基于以太坊和IPFS去中心化电子合同签约平台。通过DCC，任何个人、企业都可以在无需第三方介入的情况下快速、便捷、安全地完成合同签署。
